summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the City Comptroller to advertise for sale negotiable bonds of The City of Seattle. in the sum of Two Hundred Thirty Thousand ($230,000) Dollars of the bonds in the sum of Four Hundred Twenty-one Thousand($421,000) Dollars voted at the general election held in The City of Seattle., on the eighth day of March, 1910, under and pursuant to Ordinance No. 23217 of said City, approved February 1, 1910.
